name: Lone (RacoonMittens)
description:
Traverse a number of planets in this short game created for the Sykoo game jam. This was made as a way to test and improve my knowledge of using timelines and building atmosphere. 

Font: Beon - http://www.fontspace.com/bastien-sozoo/beon

Music from Jukedeck -  https://www.jukedeck.com/

All other assets created by me.
